attributes.action: Call for a Judicial Review in to the London Olympics 2012
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition requesting a judicial review in to the London 2012 olympics on the grounds of irrationality and procedural impropriety.

The Treasury and the Department for Culture, Media and Sport are discussing a price of £9bn - up from the £2.35bn set out in London's bid document.
